item.title: [1434] Summons Complaint with Exhibits - 02.11.26 (003) - FINAL
item.description: A lawsuit from the Yantic, Taftville, Occum and Laurel Hill volunteer fire departments against the City of Norwich over the city's August 2025 establishment of Unified Command Structure. According to attorney Mark Kovack, who is representing the departments, the lawsuit has not yet filed with court. The suit is awaiting service and/or return of service in order to file, Kovack said on Wednesday. | 41 pages | Source: Mark Kovack
